  • Constructor Details

    • RegularMachine

      public RegularMachine(ArrayList<Items> items, int[][] machineBalance)
      This is the contructor method that accepts the arraylist of items and machine balance and initialize it to the given values.
      Parameters:
      items - contains the item name
      machineBalance - contains the stock of each denomination

  • Method Details

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(int itemIndex, int quantity)
      restockItem handles the restock of items.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the itemIndex of the product
      quantity - contains number of stock to be added

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(int itemIndex, int price)
      setPrice updates the price of the selected item.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the itemIndex of the product
      price - contains the new price

    • replenishMachineBal

      public void replenishMachineBal(int[][] balance)
      replenishMachineBal updates the stock of the denomination.
      Parameters:
      balance - a 2D array that contains the new stock to be added (per denomination)

    • collectMachineBalance

      public void collectMachineBalance()
      collectMachineBalance collects the machine balance.

    • countItems

      public int countItems()
      countItems count the total number of items in the machine.
      Returns:
      the number of items

    • printSalesSummary

      public void printSalesSummary()
      printSalesSummary printes the sales summary from the date the machine was last restocked up to the day this method was called.

    • checkQuantity

      public boolean checkQuantity(int itemIndex)
      checkQuantity checks if the quantity of an item is still more than 0.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the index of the product chosen.
      Returns:
      true if the quantity is more than 0, false otherwise.

    • processPayment

      public int processPayment(int itemIndex)
      processPayment asks user for their payment and calls produceChange once the payment is equals to the total payable or more than.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the item index of the selected product.
      Returns:
      the value of total payment inserted, returns 0 if the user cancelled the transaction.

    • produceChange

      public boolean produceChange(int totalInserted, int totalPayable)
      produceChange calculates the change of the user.
      Parameters:
      totalInserted - contains the total amount of payment that the user inserted.
      totalPayable - contains the total payable of the user.
      Returns:
      true if producing of change is successful, false otherwise.

    • dispenseItem

      public void dispenseItem(int itemIndex)
      dispenseItem deducts the quantity of the selected item
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the index of the selected product.

    • displayMachine

      public void displayMachine()
      displayMachine prints the details of the machine in the terminal.

    • saveTransaction

      public void saveTransaction(int itemIndex, int payment)
      saveTransaction saves the transaction once it is successful.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - contains the index of the itemindex.
      payment - contains the total amount that the user paid.
